Estelle Akofio-Sowah bụ onye a mụrụ na Scotland , onye ọchụnta ego Ghana na onye isi obodo CSquared Ghana ugbu a na onye bụ bu onye isi  Google Ghana. Estelle bụ bu onye isi nchịkwa nke BusyInternet, onye na-enye ọrụ ịntanetị na Ghana.
A mụrụ Estelle na Scotland n'aka nna Ghana
Ezinụlọ ya kwa gara Osu na Ghana mgbe ọ dị ọnwa isii.

Ọ gara Ghana International School mgbe ahụ na Mahadum Sussex ebe o nwere akara ugo mmụta na Economics and Development Studies yana Fellow nke klas nke abụọ nke Africa Leadership Initiative-West Africa na onye otu Aspen Global Leadership Network.
Estelle bụ onye isi mba ugbu a maka Google Ghana
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye isi nchịkwa maka Busyinternet, ụlọ ọrụ na-ahụ maka ISP, cyber cafe na ụlọ ọrụ azụmahịa

Ọ bụ onye njikwa nnọkọ na oriri na La Palm Royal Beach Hotel na onye nchịkwa ọrụ nke National Poverty Reduction Program na ProNet, onye mmekọ NGO nke Water Aid UK. Ọ bụkwa onye isi oche nke Ghana Internet Service Providers Association.
